metadata.name: Endless Canvas
metadata.description: The piece ' Endless Canvas' represents gratitude, endless passion, creative-personal evolution and the journey of 1 year into NFTs. This piece is a compiling visual presentation of almost all the NFTs I have created throughout the year. The objective for putting this edition is to show my gratitude towards myself and people who appreciated and believed in my work and would like to have this art in theirÂ collection.
